about_the_game:
From the developer of Alien Blue for reddit.

Game Pauser gives you the power to pause your games and cutscenes at any time.

Un-pausable cutscenes and un-pausable games no longer need to be a source of frustration.

It is free to use, source available and respectfully developed to value your time.

Features

  • Pauses un-pausable cutscenes and un-pausable gameplay
  • Perfect for Mouse & Keyboard gamers
  • Perfect for Controller / Gamepad gamers
  • Re-mappable Keys and Gamepad buttons for pausing/resuming
  • Hand-crafted, minimal and compact interface design
  • Sleeps in the background and stays out of your way
  • Incredibly easy to use
  • Allows using your phone as a back-up if a game doesn't allow pausing via Keyboard or Gamepad
  • Subtle audible cue to let you know that the game has paused/resumed
  • Dark UI theme for visual comfort
  • Ability to include / exclude games and folders that can be paused
  • Advanced customisation available through well-documented configuration files
  • Runs without admin / elevated permissions
  • DRM free and can be run independently (even without Steam)
  • Source available for personal and educational use
  • Gives back control over your time

DO NOT USE with Multiplayer Games, as doing so may lead to getting kicked off a server or banned. This product is intended only for Single Player experiences.

ALWAYS test games with a new save file first to ensure the game handles pausing without issues. Alternatively backup your save files beforehand to avoid any risk of save file corruption.
